hero.heading: Cloud Deployment Models
hero.intro: Understand where your servers live: Are they shared (Bus) or private (Car)?

sections.title: Public Cloud
content: Infrastructure is owned by AWS and shared by everyone.
Analogy: Public Bus. Cheap, shared, but you don't control the route.
Tanglish: Share auto maari. Cost kammi, but seat share pannanum.

sections.title: Private Cloud
content: Infrastructure is dedicated to YOU only.
Analogy: Own Car. Expensive, secure, full freedom.
Tanglish: Own Car maari. Cost athigam, but full control nammakku thaan.

sections.title: Hybrid Cloud
content: Using both Public and Private together.
Keep secure data private, run website on public.
Analogy: Renting a car for trips (Public) + Owning a bike for local (Private).

summary: Hybrid Cloud = Best of both worlds.
